messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: You guys have a good shift

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

High levels of radiation detected near the station. Maintenance is best shielded from radiation.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

The radiation threat has passed. Please return to your workplaces.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: WE NEW GANG, WE NEW COMMAND, WE NEW RULE, WE NEW LAW, WE. NEW. STATION!!!!!!

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I IS HER TOO I BE NW SECUTITUY MEN I STOP BAD GUY WHO NO FOLLOW GANG RUKLE!!!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Security Post - Medbay.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Service.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Reports of the station being slaughtered entirely by two marauders have been flooding in. If someone could find these prank callers and report them to the authorities, that would be wonderfull. 
Thanks, and have a safe day, Crew.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.
